summary: This is an email from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York regarding a draft press release about MCC guards, specifically mentioning Tova Noel. The document appears to be internal DOJ communication about public affairs matters.

persons.name: Tova Noel
persons.context: Named in the subject of a draft press release about MCC guards, indicating she is a guard at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

persons.name: Geoff
persons.context: Referenced as having approved a draft press release about MCC guards, suggesting a supervisory or approval role within the Department of Justice.

connections.description: Geoff approved a draft press release concerning Tova Noel, indicating a professional supervisory or approval relationship within the DOJ context.

events.title: Draft Press Release on MCC Guards
events.description: An email is sent containing a Geoff-approved draft press release regarding MCC guards, with Tova Noel specifically named.

keyFacts: The document is an internal DOJ email dated November 18, 2019, concerning a press release about MCC guards.
A draft press release specifically names Tova Noel as an MCC guard.
The draft press release was approved by an individual named Geoff within the DOJ.
